name: Cross Cut (Tomasque)
description:
Cut the quilt quickly - and correctly!

Made for the 36-hour 2022 Microgame Jam at UCSC.

Theme:  Arts and Crafts

Art:  Joann Wong

Music:  Sophie Martin

Programming:  Tomas Hickman, Emmett Jones

Code used: 

Multi-Dimensional Array by user2530227 (https://stackoverflow.com/questions/21345402/declare-multi-dimensional-array)

Set Image Color by DiegoSLTS (https://answers.unity.com/questions/995250/how-to-change-the-color-of-an-image-w...)
